about_the_game:
It's 7 o'clock on a friday night. There's 600,000 zombies between you and the city limits. You've got one hour, before a nuclear bomb hits, turning the city and everything in it to ash.

Ashcroft is a Metroidvania inspired Platform Fighter in which you must fight against both time and zombies in a mad dash through city of Ashcroft, rescuing as many of your friends and family as possible, while punching as many zombies as physically possible.

Play as a variety of different characters, each with their own personality, fighting style and special moves, and fight (or sneak) your way through the diverse locations that make up the city - from Downtown Ashcroft to the Iron Works, then back to Suburban Hell and even the amusement park "Paulie's Pier".

Ashcroft features high intensity combat, acrobatic platforming, and all the zombies you can punch. There's a riveting Story Mode, a deadly and ultra-challenging Survival Mode, a local versus mode to challenge yourself vs computers or other players, it's got, more zombies than you can punch, and a handful of unique and fun characters to survive the apocalypse with. Plus, it's fully co-operative, so you and your friends can escape the city together!

name: Ashcroft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 4500U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics 2.38 GHz
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Ashcroft is a high-intensity Platform Fighter in which you have one hour to fight your way out of a zombie infested city. Are you a bad enough dude to save your friends and get out alive? How many zombies can you punch before they eat you alive?
